name: SuggestaChore
0:
”Alexa, start suggest a chore”
”Alexa, ask suggest a chore what I should work on”
”Alexa, tell suggest a chore to give me a task”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: suggest a chore
des: Not sure where to start when it comes to chores? This skill is meant to help kick start some household cleaning. Think of it as productivity roulette. Most chores suggested are specific and easily accomplished; no 'clean the whole household' type suggestions. Good for dividing up cleaning tasks among roommates or family members. Chores include kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, living room, office, outside and general cleaning.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
